args.new_description: Highly corrosive acids requiring specific materials for safe handling and storage.
args.justification: Current class_group 'Industrial Chemical Handling' is too process-focused; 'Industrial Chemicals' better reflects the material/chemical nature of the class and aligns with similar classes.

args.new_description: Chemicals used in amine treating processes to remove H2S and CO2 from hydrocarbon streams.
args.justification: Class_group 'Industrial Chemical Handling' is too broad and process-oriented; 'Industrial Chemicals' is more accurate for a class of chemicals/materials.

args.new_description: Processes and units involved in the treatment of sour water containing hydrogen sulfide.
args.justification: Clarified class_label to emphasize process/unit focus; class_group is appropriate as is.

args.new_description: Corrosion mechanisms such as oxidation and sulfidation that stainless steels resist.
args.justification: Refined class_label and description for clarity and consistency; class_group is correct.

args.new_description: Process units designed to separate components at reduced pressure to lower their boiling points.
args.justification: Pluralized class_label for consistency with other class naming; class_group is correct.
